snippet: The country’s committee was suspended in 2012 because of corruption concerns, forcing Indian athletes to compete under the Olympic flag.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; International Olympic Committee reinstates the Indian Olympic Association, which was suspended in 2012 for what the IOC said were chronic violations of the Olympic Charter and internal corruption; action marks first time a country's governing body has been reinstated during a Games.
lead_paragraph: The country’s committee was suspended in 2012 because of corruption concerns, forcing Indian athletes to compete under the Olympic flag.
